description: Creates a commit for a repository on the tip of a specified branch.

parameters.name: repositoryName
parameters.description: The name of the repository where you create the commit.

parameters.name: branchName
parameters.description: The name of the branch where you create the commit.

parameters.name: putFiles
parameters.description: The files to add or update in this commit. (dict) --- Information about a file added or updated as part of a commit. The full path to the file in the repository, including the name of the file. fileMode (string) --- The extrapolated file mode permissions for the file. Valid values include EXECUTABLE and NORMAL. fileContent (bytes) --- The content of the file, if a source file is not specified. sourceFile (dict) --- The name and full path of the file that contains the changes you want to make as part of the commit, if you are not providing the file content directly. The full path to the file, including the name of the file. isMove (boolean) --- Whether to remove the source file from the parent commit.

nested_params.name: filePath
nested_params.description: The full path to the file in the repository, including the name of the file.

nested_params.name: fileMode
nested_params.description: The extrapolated file mode permissions for the file. Valid values include EXECUTABLE and NORMAL.

nested_params.name: fileContent
nested_params.description: The content of the file, if a source file is not specified.

nested_params.name: sourceFile
nested_params.description: The name and full path of the file that contains the changes you want to make as part of the commit, if you are not providing the file content directly.

nested_params.name: filePath
nested_params.description: The full path to the file, including the name of the file.

nested_params.name: isMove
nested_params.description: Whether to remove the source file from the parent commit.

parameters.name: deleteFiles
parameters.description: The files to delete in this commit. These files still exist in earlier commits. (dict) --- A file that is deleted as part of a commit. The full path of the file to be deleted, including the name of the file.

nested_params.name: filePath
nested_params.description: The full path of the file to be deleted, including the name of the file.

parameters.name: setFileModes
parameters.description: The file modes to update for files in this commit. (dict) --- Information about the file mode changes. The full path to the file, including the name of the file. The file mode for the file.

nested_params.name: filePath
nested_params.description: The full path to the file, including the name of the file.

nested_params.name: fileMode
nested_params.description: The file mode for the file.

nested_items.name: commitId
nested_items.description: The full commit ID of the commit that contains your committed file changes.

nested_items.name: treeId
nested_items.description: The full SHA-1 pointer of the tree information for the commit that contains the commited file changes.

nested_items.name: filesAdded
nested_items.description: The files added as part of the committed file changes.

nested_items.name: absolutePath
nested_items.description: The full path to the file to be added or updated, including the name of the file.

nested_items.name: blobId
nested_items.description: The blob ID that contains the file information.

nested_items.name: fileMode
nested_items.description: The extrapolated file mode permissions for the file. Valid values include EXECUTABLE and NORMAL.

nested_items.name: filesUpdated
nested_items.description: The files updated as part of the commited file changes.

nested_items.name: absolutePath
nested_items.description: The full path to the file to be added or updated, including the name of the file.

nested_items.name: blobId
nested_items.description: The blob ID that contains the file information.

nested_items.name: fileMode
nested_items.description: The extrapolated file mode permissions for the file. Valid values include EXECUTABLE and NORMAL.

nested_items.name: filesDeleted
nested_items.description: The files deleted as part of the committed file changes.

nested_items.name: absolutePath
nested_items.description: The full path to the file to be added or updated, including the name of the file.

nested_items.name: blobId
nested_items.description: The blob ID that contains the file information.

nested_items.name: fileMode
nested_items.description: The extrapolated file mode permissions for the file. Valid values include EXECUTABLE and NORMAL.
